name: Reshiram
flavorText:
This Pokémon appears in legends.
It sends flames into the air from its
tail, burning up everything around it.

previous.name: Thundurus
previous.flavorText:
Countless charred remains mar the
landscape of places through which
Thundurus has passed.
previous.formDescription:
Forms have different stats and abilities.  Thundurus switches forms when the reveal glass is used on it.

The Reveal Glass may be obtained by taking a Therian landorus to abundant shrine.  (Landorus can be obtained in Therian Forme from the Dream Radar.)

next.name: Zekrom
next.flavorText:
Concealing itself in lightning clouds,
it flies throughout the Unova region.
It creates electricity in its tail.

pokemon.name: Reshiram
pokemon.flavorText:
This Pokémon appears in legends.
It sends flames into the air from its
tail, burning up everything around it.
